item.title: Temple of Seitan: The ultimate vegan fried chicken?
item.author: Chloe Foo,
item.description: If you haven’t heard of Temple of Seitan, let me give you a rundown. Vegan fried chicken. The cries of outrage in response to the word ‘vegan’ that aligns to the reaction towards the word ‘feminism’ is to be addressed in another article. For now, it is sufficient to say that in my opinion, the myths …
